howToHandleCustomer: If damages are claimed, complete Report of Accident Form Item #372474

VD: Call Debbie, Quality Assurance Department Ext. 6681

howToHandleProduct: Hold Product at store in secure location
Wait for product pick-up instructions from Woonsocket Office
Take a full markdown for seized or returned products
howToHandleOutsideAgencies: Cooperate with all agencies (ex: FDA, Dept. of Health): verify positive identification
No documents are to be signed: contact Insurance Claims Department
Obtain a receipt for any samples seized: you may sign this receipt
howToCompleteForm: Forward ORIGINAL to Quality Assurance Dept. (Attach Report of Accident Form when necessary)

customerInformation.details: the customer purchased 3 packs of Bensons hedges menthol 100's which were contaminated. The product caused stomach pains. This has happened before. The cigarettes were bought elsewhere.
